Summary: Large bright light, seeming to proceed closer, decended, light faded & flew east, dissapreared.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in the livingroom watching Cartoons (yes, cartoons), when Laura noticed an odd, bright light across the street in the sky growing larger. So, Naturally, we wanted to watch, and find out what it was. So we watched through the bay windows, as the light, in a tear-drop-like shape seemed to decent rappidly as it grew larger in size. Then, out of no where, it slowly faded to where it was barely visable, and vaguely resembled airplane lights, but in a differant pattern and in the wrong placements, then flew upward, and over in an eastward direction. It went on around the side of the house, where we seemed to see the underside of this.. thing. it looked as though it had a star-diamond shaped lighter area, with lights at the points. Then we ran inside and started locking doors, because at this point, we were petrafied.
